title: Restaurant Fulfillment Event
description: Append-only fulfillment event for restaurant pickup or on-demand delivery. This event does not carry per-line-item quantities; those remain on the order snapshot.

occurred_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when this fulfillment event occurred.

type.description: Fulfillment event type. Examples: pickup.ready, pickup.arrived, pickup.completed, pickup.canceled, delivery.pending, delivery.pickup, delivery.pickup_complete, delivery.dropoff, delivery.delivered, delivery.canceled, delivery.returned, delivery.ongoing.

description.description: Human-readable description of the fulfillment status.
